title: Weather Dashboard
description: Developed a weather dashboard that displays real-time data from public APIs. This application allows users to view the latest weather information with a responsive and modern look using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Tictactoe Game
description: Create an interactive Tic-Tac-Toe game that can be played with friends. Developed with React for a responsive gaming experience, and using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS for an attractive look.

title: Landing Page
description: A modern and responsive landing page designed to highlight key projects and skills. Built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS to ensure a seamless user experience.

title: My First Portfolio
description: This is my first portfolio website, designed to showcase my projects, skills, and experience in web development. It features a modern and responsive design built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Skinory APIs
description: An API service designed for skincare analysis and product recommendations. Skinory APIs leverage web scraping and data processing to provide accurate and relevant skincare information.
